email_body: can you please add this ---------------------- Forwarded by John Arnold/HOU/ECT on 09/26/2000 11:03 AM --------------------------- Enron North America Corp. From: Molly Magee 09/25/2000 06:28 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject: Mario De La Ossa John: John Nowlan, Dave Botchlett, Jim Goughray and several others met with Mario last week. They were all favorably impressed. Jeff Shankman had asked to meet with him, and their appointment is scheduled for Thursday, 9/28, at 1:30 pm. Jeff had also asked that you spend some time with him so that a decision could be made as to whether or not to make him an offer. Would you have some time available on Thursday afternoon to see Mario? Thanks, Molly x34804
